lead_paragraph: Berkeley College is being investigated over concerns about high dropout and loan-default rates, but it does well when it comes to the mobility rate of its students.
snippet: Berkeley College is being investigated over concerns about high dropout and loan-default rates, but it does well when it comes to the mobility rate of its students....

headline.main: Mixed Picture for a For-Profit College
headline.print_headline: At Berkeley, Picture for Graduation Rate and Loans Is Mixed
